channel.title: Needing Help W/ Conqueronline Script
channel.description:
program PressKeys; Var x,y: <---I think this is right i dont screw with var's much begin KeyDown(VK_CONTROL) Repeat If ClickMouse(x,y,False); Then FunctionKeyDown(1) // Need Code to Press F1 Key Until(False); end.
Quick rundown: I Need to Get Control Key to Be held down; doesnt seem like a problem. secondly, if mouse is right clicked need to get f1 key clicked. not sure of the code needed there. trying to get this process repeated indefinetly. Tyvm in advance for the help guys/gals

item.title: Needing Help W/ Conqueronline Script
item.dc:creator: @Moloch Moloch
item.description:
@Moloch wrote:

[quote=“inferno, post:17, topic:2442”][code]program PressKeys;

begin
KeyDown(17); //keycode for control key
Repeat
If(IsMouseButtonDown(True))then
begin
KeyDown((112)); //keycode for F1
Wait(250);
KeyUp((112));
end;
until(False);
end.[/code][/quote]
Inferno you’ve got it down to close enough. and for everyone else tyvm for the help. Again id like to invite everyone to give autoing conqueronline a shot. registeration is in my sig. its totally free.[br][size=1]Posted at: May 16, 2006, 05:25:14 pm[/size][hr]Hey Guys This is My Final Simple Product… nothing much but if you play conqueronline this thing saves your fingers frm carpol tunnel syndrome. Tyvm to everyone who gave me a hand and put up with posts you probably had no clue as to what in the heck i was attempting. if i knew how to add credibility/Karma/ or what ever else kinda reward for being helpful id be more than obliged.
Again tyvm for the help on my auto jumper/sitter gonna make the game a lot easier on me now.

program PressKeys;

begin
Repeat
KeyDown(17);//added
If(IsMouseButtonDown(True))then //checks for mouseclick
Wait(500);
begin
KeyDown((112)); //keycode for F1
Wait(500);
KeyUp((112));
Wait(500);
end;
ClearDebug;
until(False);
end.

Read full topic

So this would have been another problem to crop up?

item.title: Needing Help W/ Conqueronline Script
item.dc:creator: @Moloch Moloch
item.description:
@Moloch wrote:

Lol ok Kyle thanks.
reason behind this is, in conquer(online) you hold in the left control to jump to move around quickly, and can set hotkeys from F1-F8, Sit is used to regain stamina to perform certain functions and im trying to make my avatar jump and then sit.

so basically it’s

Control (always held)
Left Mouse (or right depending on situation)
F1
Again thanks guys[br][size=1]Posted at: May 14, 2006, 09:44:48 am[/size][hr]Ah im begining to think that it cannot check if the mouse has been clicked. again type mismatch on line 8:30
program PressKeys;
Var
x,y :integer;

begin
KeyDown(17); //keycode for control key
Repeat
If(ClickMouse(x,y,True)= true);then
begin
KeyDown(112); //keycode for F1
Wait(250);
KeyUp(112);
end;
until(False);
end.

Read full topic

Var
x,y :integer;

begin
KeyDown(17); //keycode for control key
Repeat
If(ClickMouse(x,y,False))then

item.title: Needing Help W/ Conqueronline Script
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

Use this instead

program PressKeys;
Var
 x,y :integer;

begin
 KeyDown(17); //keycode for control key
 Repeat
  If(ClickMouse(x,y,False))then
  begin
   KeyDown(112); //keycode for F1
   Wait(250);
   KeyUp(112);
  end;
 until(False);
end.

that should work

Read full topic

[br][size=1]Posted at: May 10, 2006, 11:58:21 am[/size][hr]Ok guys new problem now:
Line 7: [Error] (7:25): ‘THEN’ expected in script

  1. program PressKeys;
  2. Var
  3. x,y:integer;
  4. begin
  5. KeyDown(VK_CONTROL)
  6. Repeat
  7. If ClickMouse(x,y,False); Then <---- my problem is there or rather Then.
  8. KeyDown(VK_F1);
  9. Wait(250);
    10.KeyUp(VK_F1);
    Until(False);
    end.

item.title: Needing Help W/ Conqueronline Script
item.dc:creator: @Moloch Moloch
item.description:
@Moloch wrote:

program PressKeys;
Var
x,y: <—I think this is right i dont screw with var’s much
begin
KeyDown(VK_CONTROL)
Repeat
If ClickMouse(x,y,False); Then
FunctionKeyDown(1) // Need Code to Press F1 Key
Until(False);
end.

Quick rundown:
I Need to Get Control Key to Be held down; doesnt seem like a problem. secondly, if mouse is right clicked need to get f1 key clicked. not sure of the code needed there.
trying to get this process repeated indefinetly.
Tyvm in advance for the help guys/gals

Read full topic
